title: Matched with good people
body:
I turned 30 about 5 days ago realising I'm always matched with golds and plats. I'm unranked and I don't even find myself that good considering my games aren't always consistent. So why am I getting matched with all the pros etc. 

PS. I hate getting trashed by them lol..

replies.body: Plats aren't that good. And gold is shiny bronze.
how are they good? unless they are diamond 1 they are trash, so plz, don't go calling these players "good"

Are you duoing? And imo, unranked matchups aren't very accurate. Like I was getting matched up with golds, and then I got into S3 and I started getting matched up with B5's...well I got matched with a challenger in aram ._. so yeah I dunno what riot was thinking
